text: Diego Felipe Bertie Brignardello (born November 2, 1967 in Lima) is a contemporary Peruvian actor of British and Italian descent. His performances span film, theatre and television and he recently completed a film called Qué difícil es amar (How difficult is it to love), set for release in 2018. He studied at Markham College in Lima, Peru and was also a singer in the mid eighties and had a pop group called . ==Telenovelas== * El Hombre Que Debe Morir * Natacha (1990) Pedro * Canela (1994)
